      • getAPIUrl

      • getASRDomain

        public static java.lang.String getASRDomain(Context context)

      • setStreamType

        public static void setStreamType(int streamType)
        Sets streamType to be used by SDK. Default is AudioManager.STREAM_MUSIC.
        Parameters:
        streamType - sets stream type ie. AudioManager.STREAM_SYSTEM (int value 1) or AudioManager.STREAM_MUSIC (int value 3)

      • alwaysSpeak

        public static void alwaysSpeak(boolean alwaysSpeak)
        Sets SDK so that TTS will always speak, regardless of whether the user has device on silent or not. Default is false.
        Parameters:
        alwaysSpeak - set to TRUE to have SDK always speak. set to FALSE to have SDK stay silent if device is silent.
